GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit d4f65615db7fca3df9f7e79eadf937e6ddb03c54, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 84f39b08d7868ce10eeaf640627cb89777f0ae93. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp/dccp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_fwmark_accept.
